categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Echo Two" was a female pilot who served in the Rebel Alliance during the Galactic Civil War. After the destruction of Alderaan, she served under the callsign Echo Two for Echo Squadron and participated in a battle at Fostar Haven, flying an X-wing. During the later stages of the battle, she was killed when Echo Squadron had to rescue a stranded Alderaanian refugee convoy under attack from the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Vigilance.
"Echo Two" was a Rebel non-player character in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons.
